actions.description: The hunter makes two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack (Hunter Form Only)

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw (Hunter Form Only)

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the hunter can't make a Tail attack against another target.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description:
The hunter emits a pulse of energy that helps it better locate its magical quarry. Each creature within 120 feet of the hunter that has the ability to cast spells must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be mystically marked by the hunter for 1 hour.

While marked, a creature can't become hidden from the hunter and gains no benefit from the invisible condition against the hunter. Additionally, while a marked creature is on the same plane of existence as the hunter, the hunter always knows the distance and direction to the creature.
actions.name: Mage Tracker (Sentry Form Only)

specialTraits.description: The hunter knows the location of every spellcaster, active spell, and magic item within 120 feet of itself.
specialTraits.name: Magic Sense

specialTraits.description: The hunter can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb (Hunter Form Only)
